# Find corporation names in messy text with typos and inconsistent name formats

## load packages

Install this package with 
```
devtools::install_github("judgelord/corporations")
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(corporations)
```


This vignette also uses `rvest`.

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(rvest) # for web scraping 
```

## Corporations Mentioned on the Financial Times business page

Using `rvest` we scrape the ft.com and get all linked stories.  

```{r}
html <- read_html("https://www.ft.com/companies") # The FT homepage
links <- html_nodes(html, "a") # "a" nodes are linked text

ft <- html_text(links)

ft[35:45]
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
corporations::extract(ft) |> 
  dplyr::drop_na()
```
